numbered_ace_sentences: 3. Young women in the study are more likely to contact their parents than young men in the study.
4. Young men tend to choose online communication rather than in-person communication.
5. Young women tend to choose online communication rather than in-person communication.
6. Sending texts is the most popular way of communication.
7. Women are more likely to contact their parents than men.
8. I ask why women are more likely to contact their parents than men.
9. I ask whether gender plays a role.
10. I ask whether societal standards play a role.
13. Everyone in my community leaves for college.
14. Staying in contact with parents becomes a question.
15. The headline is: How often are you contacting your parents?
